variable.name: SAMP_SOURCE
variable.description: Source repository where samples originate. HUSTLE=Long Term Effects of Hydroxyurea Therapy in Children with Sickle Cell Disease; SWITCH=Stroke with Transfusions Changing to Hydroxyurea

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository. HUSTLE=Long Term Effects of Hydroxyurea Therapy in Children with Sickle Cell Disease; SWITCH=Stroke with Transfusions Changing to Hydroxyurea
